objects.text:
Japanese Quartz Movement
Stainless Steel Construction
Multi-function Chronograph
3ATM Waterproof (30m)

product_details.description: ⌚Movement: Japanese imported quartz analog movement and battery, provide precise time and long-term running. The watch can be used for more than 1 years. ⌚Material: The strap is made of stainless steel, comfortable and soft and breathable. Mineral glasses, 304 steel case, Suit for all kinds of occasions. ⌚Sports chronograph: Multifunctional sub-dial can work, chronograph, calendar, run seconds. Provide you with multi-function purpose use. ⌚3ATM waterproof: This watch is waterproof 30m, can withstand daily splash or short immersion in water, but not swimming and showering, diving or snorkeling. ☎After sales service: Each product has 1-year after sales service. If you have any questions about the product, please contact me immediately and we will give you a satisfactory solution. Item width - 4.2 centimeters ** Clasp type - Push Button Foldover Clasp With Safety ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
This banner features a high-contrast and modern luxury-themed layout centered around a dark gradient background with dynamic golden linear graphical accents. The focal point is a high-quality product image of a wristwatch, positioned to the right for visual balance. On the left, attention-grabbing layered text elements include a bold uppercase headline (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) in a golden hue, an industrial-tech stylized subheadline (`subheading`), and a clean multiline product description (`description`) in light gray. Pricing (`price`) is prominent in large golden letters, followed by a CTA button (`cta_button`) labeled (`cta`) in black on gold. A thin decorative line (`decorative`) separates the subheading and description for visual structure.

**Color Palette:**
- Gold: #D4AF37, #C5A028 (gradients)
- Background Dark Gradient: #1A1A1A → #2D2D2D
- Silver Gray: #E0E0E0
- White: #FFFFFF
- Deep Charcoal: #1A1A1A
product_color: The product image exudes a premium, modern aesthetic through a refined monochromatic color palette. Dominated by deep graphite and charcoal tones, the watch showcases a sleek black metallic band (#1C1C1C) and a brushed gunmetal dial (#3A3A3A), harmoniously blending subtle gradients of gray. The sub-dials and markers, rendered in polished silver-gray (#B0B0B0), stand out crisply without overpowering the overall visual balance. The smooth color transitions lend depth and dimension, especially under lighting, creating reflective highlights that emphasize the watch’s high-quality finish. For an advertisement banner, complementing shades like jet black (#0D0D0D), steel silver (#C0C0C0), and onyx gray (#2F2F2F) will preserve the luxurious tone.
